name: Thanadoula
summary: Layering real-life details with an otherworldly magic, Thanadoula recounts the story of an end-of-life doula brought to her calling through the loss of her beloved sister.
info:
• 上映年度: 2020
  • 片长: 6min
  • 官方网站: https://www.nfb.ca/film/thanadoula/
  • 制片国家/地区: 加拿大
  • 导演: Robin McKenna
